Letter Nᵛ 𒉡 < 𒉌 •M ! 𒉽 ≈ 𒀸·𒀹 ≈ 𒉡 nu (late form)

𒉡 ≈ ¬ ≈ ≠ no 𓂜 ≠ 𓌡

0 nulla 𓂜 MO / NO 𒉡 NU(la)

𒉡 nu neō "to spin (thread); to make yarn" <> näh

𒉡 nuᵛ “now” @Hittite νῦν nûn нꙑнѣ nyně nūnaĩ नूनम् nūnám 𒈾𒀀𒉡𒌦 nānun nun "now"

𒉡 NU 𓂜 no¬ un¬ not¬

𒉡 NUˡ 𓂜 non- nil¬ nulla¬ #lā “not” #ul “not”

𒉡 NUᵍ 𓂜 nicht negate

𒉡 NUᵍ Nagel > nail 𒉌 Niete

𒉡 NUᵍ NG in 𒁺𒌦𒉡 ˢdu-un-nuᵍ strong

𒉡 NUᵍ NG in change 𒅔𒎏𒉡𒌋 ᶜʰin-nen-nuᵍ-e

𒉡 NUᵍ NG in ၚု ŋùˀ हिङ्गु hiṅgu ᬳᬶᬂᬕᬸ hinggu हींग hīṅg هنگ hing انگدان angodân aṅkwaṣ անգուժատ "fennel gum" asafoetida

𒉡 NUᵍ GN in 𒉡 gnat (mosquito, fly) <> 𓂜 𓏏

𒉡 NUᵍ GN in 𒉡 kein¬

𒉡 NUᵍ GN in genitalia / male nuts 𒉭

𒉡 NU 𒉣 NUN 𒉪 难 男 nán/nán man

𒉡 NU -ner in 𒉡𒊬 gardener reverse

𒉡 OHNE < SANs sine

𒉡 EN- ana- prefix ⚠️

𒉡 𒁄𒌑 NU BAL-ú un-alter-able

𒉡 NU ≈ 𒎙 niš 𓀀𓁐 Mensch 𓀀

𒉡 NU ≈ MU in 𒉡 "man"

𒉡 NU ≈ MU in 𒉡𒉭 ᵐnu.nus 𒊩 munus µwoman <> nun

𒉌𒅆 nation humanity

Just like 𓂜, 𒉡 was originally MAN / MA>NO:

𒉡𒍣 = MAKE 𒊻 𒄷 Mach double consonant orthography:
𒉡𒊻𒍣 = MAKE (Turkish/Hittite suffix) vs
𒉡𒊻𒍣 = LET (Nulla confusion)

𒆠𒉡𒉌 kiln/Grill (brazier n/l)

GHAIN 𐎙 kein ¬ 𒉡 non ⋍ 𐎙 nong = farmer

nurma “pomegranate” wanderword

𒉡𒌫𒈠 NU'UR2-MA /nurmû/ nurma "pomegranate" Sumerian
𒉡𒊑𒅎𒁺 (nu'ri-im-du /nurimdu, nurimtu/, “pomegranate” Akkadian
𒉡𒊏𒀭𒋾 nu'ᵍra-an-ti ⲛ-granate “pomegranate” PSM grānātum "seeded" Medieval granatum "dark red" грана́т hranát
𒉡𒊏𒀭𒋾 (nu'ra-an-ti /nuranti/, “pomegranate” Hurrian => Armenian նուռն (nuṙn) նուռ (hy) (nuṙ)
𒉡𒊏𒋾 (/nurati-/) “pomegranate” Hittite Persian نار (nâr), انار (anâr, “pomegranate”, 榴 m·ru OC
𒉡𒌫𒈠 nurma ⇔ Akkadian 𒄑𒈢𒆳𒊏 /armannu/ ሩማን (ruman), ሮማን (roman) رُمَّان m (rummān) רימון \ רִמּוֹן (rimmṓn), Punic *𐤓𐤌𐤍 (rmn /rimmūn/) and Aramaic רִימֹּונָא / רִמֹּונָא (rimmōnā) / רוּמָּנָא / ܪܘܡܢܐ (rummānā)
𒉡𒌫𒈠 nurma ⇔ Akkadian 𒇻𒆸𒌅 (/lurmû, lurimtu, lurinnu/, “pomegranate” Ugaritic 𐎍𐎗𐎎𐎐 (lrmn, “pomegranate”
𓈖 𓉔 𓏮 𓌴 𓁹 𓄿 𓄿 𓈒 𓏥 | pomegranate (tree and fruit) | #n.H.m.iri.a.ar/tiu ⇔ Adamsapfel 𓁹
𓇋 𓈖 𓉔 𓏠 𓆭 | pomegranate | #jnhmn > Demotic hrnt > ⲉⲣⲙⲁⲛ (erman, Bohairic), ⲗⲉϩⲙⲉⲛ (lehmen) ϩⲉⲣⲙⲁⲛ (herman, Sahidic).
𓇋 𓆛 𓈖 𓉔 𓅓 𓂝 𓈖 𓏮 𓆭 | pomegranate (tree and fruit) | (jnhmn /alhammān/)

𒄑 𒋭𒁱 {ĝeš} lal3-dar "pomegranate" ‘sweet red‘

𒉡 ⲛ- EN- ana- prefix ⲛᵍ- ge- ⇔ -ner -nik ⚠️

𒃻 𒈾𒈨 𒉡 𒈬𒁕𒀀𒌇 nig̃₂ na-me nu-mu-da-a-tuku /nig name nu-mu'dâtuku/ I owe you nothing

nu <> mun in nukušu ≈ numunkuš

𒉡𒊨𒅇 nu-kuš₂u₃ nukušu widow ¬man ¬𓀀 אַלְמָנָה almaná 𐎀𐎍𐎎𐎐𐎚 ảlmnt ʾalmanatu 𓁐 #almattu widow 𒉡𒈬𒌦𒋢;𒉡𒈬𒋢;𒉡𒈬𒌦𒄾 nu-mu-un-kuš;nu-mu-kuš;nu-mu-un-kuš8 numunkuš widow
